nodes.text: The doom of the Ordu Aspectu was a battle that took place many years before the Battle of Yavin between the Jedi Order, Ordu Aspectu (a Jedi splinter group), and droids controlled by Eternal Rur. Upon the arrival of Jedi inspectors to the Citadel of Rur, Eternal Rur seized control of the facility's droids and began to kill the Citadel's inhabitants. Seeking to contain Eternal Rur, the mortal Rur jumped the citadel through hyperspace and managed to deactivate Eternal Rur at the cost of his own life.
